rescues.name: Reg
rescues.description: Reg would benefit from a quiet home where his new family can give him all the affectionate, he needs, he does give the very best cuddles.

rescues.name: Buddy
rescues.description: Buddy is vocal in general; he loves the sound of his own voice! A family with some training experience would be beneficial to help Buddy.

rescues.name: Buddy2
rescues.description: Buddy does enjoy human company but can take time to build up that bond, he has shown to be worried and due to this, he will need a quiet household with new owners to socialize him slowly.

rescues.name: Peeta
rescues.description: A worried soul, Peeta needs lots of confidence building to broaden his horizons and help him navigate the world.

rescues.name: Ghost
rescues.description: He will need owners who have experience of owning similar breeds and are willing to work with him to help build up him social skills around people.

rescues.name: Buster
rescues.description: Buster thrives on routine and his ideal retirement home is quiet and calm.

rescues.name: Milo
rescues.description: Milo is looking for new owners who can match his remarkably high energy levels. He is a handful and always on the go and we are currently teaching Milo how to relax and settle.

rescues.name: Harley
rescues.description: Harley has on going medical issues which our vet team will need to discuss before taking her home.

rescues.name: Night
rescues.description: Night is an amazing and lovely dog, weighing around 68.4 kg, there is a lot to love! She will need owners physically able to handle her on lead around other dogs as after being lunged at by another dog, Night is now nervous of dogs and can be reactive.

rescues.name: Jake
rescues.description: Jake is a friendly character with people but is reactive around other dogs so will need to live in a lowly populated dog area and be the only dog in the household.
